title: Family Passions
description: Each of these authors is a phenomenal seller on her own. Now Harlequin Books brings you the unprecedented opportunity of leveraging their combined reader appeal with Family Passions -- a spectacular 3-in-1 volume.Family Passions showcases some of the best work by these talented writers, each story a full-length novel of heartfelt emotion and family drama.
author: Jayne Ann Krentz
